channel.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yobtzc7.png[/img][/center] [left] [b][size=14pt]About the server:[/size][/b][/left] Welcome to the Vulcan development thread, the server is based off Hyperion by Graham. I have decided to make the switch to as I write content faster because I have used it for a good solid two years now on and off. I also like the stability compared to WL (lol not even a comparison) it also follows programming conventions so I will not get headaches when I start to program on the source.
[b][size=14pt]Development Team:[/size][/b]
[ul][li][b]Vanikan (Ares_)[/b][/li] [list] [li]Server/Client/Website Developer[/li] [/list] [li][b]Kodiak[/b][/li] [list] [li]Server Developer[/li] [/list][/ul]
[b][size=14pt]Credits:[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Graham[/li] [li]Kodiak[/li] [li]Myself[/li] [li]Scu11[/li][/ul]
[b][size=14pt]Server Media:[/size][/b] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3PXvE.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3PXCf.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3PXEV.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3Qgnv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3QgoA.jpg[/img]

item.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:55, topic:525069”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=643762.msg4344297#msg4344297 date=1375648691]
It looks like you’re ruining hyperion
[/quote]
He already quit this…[/quote]
I didn’t quit, I merged with someone who was more of a competition too me.

Arcik:

It looks like you’re ruining hyperion

How would I even be ruining Hyperion? You have not seen any of the core workings.

Read full topic

item.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

Alright I usually don’t remove my old posts to bump projects but this will be an important notice. I am closing down Vulcan, yes, I know sad. No need to fret though Vulcan will be continued under the name Astrect. You can follow our progress here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,643998.0.html now you go show that project thread some love you sexy people you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

Alright so I started just a plain range base all it has right now is checking for the arrow and shooting the projectile etc. I will improve the base a bit as I just wanted to get all the basics of each combat style working and then going back and perfecting each one.

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Ares_, post:48, topic:525069”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=643762.msg4342528#msg4342528 date=1375345315]

I could be interested. I always wanted to get into using this server base.

wut
[/quote]
Think he means use Hyperion?[/quote]
No no no no no, he’s thinking the same as I am. Pwnd is an old-time mitber, none of them care about RSPS really so it’s a rare moment when you see someone from that long ago actually offer themselves to an RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

Pwnd:

I could be interested. I always wanted to get into using this server base.

Well just let me know

[quote=“sinisoul, post:46, topic:525069”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=643762.msg4342508#msg4342508 date=1375338746]
I could be interested. I always wanted to get into using this server base.
[/quote]

wut[/quote]
Think he means use Hyperion?

asshole_rule:

Awesome updates

Thanks mate, glad to see you’re back to just being watched haha.

Edit: Alright just finished up the npc masks for combat related things. Finished up a pretty basic base for the Melee combat, supports both player and npc just didn’t feel like multi logging a client atm lol.

Huge thanks to rs2-server/scu11 as I used his combat as a huge reference and ripped most of the formulas from them

Read full topic

item.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

Alright here are some updates guys. I have decided to port everything over to Hyperion because I can not stand the lack of conventions in WinterLove server bases. So with this being said I have wrote up a trade base last night here is some media of it:


I have completed the ground item system that I started working on last night also, there is some problems with it but they are not huge problems the only problem I have encountered was when you come back into a region or a new player enters the region the items that were once deleted reappear. I should have fixed it now so it’s out of the way.

I’m now going to start on the shopping system and finishing up the npc & player masks and do the npc spawning etc etc. Should have a couple more updates within a couple of hours.

Read full topic
item.source: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!

item.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:38, topic:525069”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=643762.msg4334645#msg4334645 date=1374163693]

[quote author=Vain_ link=topic=643762.msg4334638#msg4334638 date=1374163018]

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=643762.msg4334609#msg4334609 date=1374157790]

all of your ideas sound stupid
[/quote]wat how man.
it actually make da nubz train dawg

cuz like u need dem items to make da econemy

Idk I guess they’re alright ideas, I just don’t like a lot of stuff like that.

The whole idea of resources running out on an rsps is dumb to me imho.
[/quote]yeah because a constant supply of anything is always good. l2economics
this system would also work very well if you remove all shops but basic skill tools, and general stores and then just implement play owned shops (players can craft a “shop chest” or some shit mayne)

well considering runescape has a constant supply of nearly everything along with every rsps i’ve seen, it would be a pretty big change to add into an rsps
[/quote]runescape does have a constant supply, yes. and they have a global trading system (ie grand exchange) working across all worlds and players simultaneously.

you limit the supply of items to be up to the player, and you will actually have an economy

The economy was fine before the GE?

The only possible way I believe the GE could have ruined the economy is because of the rumor that states if an item is dropped and converted to coins due to lootshare, then a person trying to buy that item would receive it for market price. I’m not sure if this is true, but it is the only possible “'game” feature that affects the economy.[/quote]it allowed for mass purchasing of any item. the economy was perfectly fine when it was static amongst the players. now the items fluctuate too much and the economy is not stable whatsoever

Read full topic
item.source: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!

item.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:28, topic:525069”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=643762.msg4334638#msg4334638 date=1374163018]

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=643762.msg4334609#msg4334609 date=1374157790]

[quote author=Vain_ link=topic=643762.msg4334441#msg4334441 date=1374118730]

all of your ideas sound stupid
[/quote]wat how man.
it actually make da nubz train dawg

cuz like u need dem items to make da econemy

Idk I guess they’re alright ideas, I just don’t like a lot of stuff like that.

The whole idea of resources running out on an rsps is dumb to me imho.
[/quote]yeah because a constant supply of anything is always good. l2economics
this system would also work very well if you remove all shops but basic skill tools, and general stores and then just implement play owned shops (players can craft a “shop chest” or some shit mayne)

well considering runescape has a constant supply of nearly everything along with every rsps i’ve seen, it would be a pretty big change to add into an rsps
[/quote]runescape does have a constant supply, yes. and they have a global trading system (ie grand exchange) working across all worlds and players simultaneously.

you limit the supply of items to be up to the player, and you will actually have an economy

The economy was fine before the GE?[/quote]
The only possible way I believe the GE could have ruined the economy is because of the rumor that states if an item is dropped and converted to coins due to lootshare, then a person trying to buy that item would receive it for market price. I’m not sure if this is true, but it is the only possible “'game” feature that affects the economy.

Read full topic

item.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:33, topic:525069”][quote author=Ares_ link=topic=643762.msg4334776#msg4334776 date=1374178949]
Thank you for the ideas Vain will take them into consideration, but as Nick said it would be a drastic change for people who are use to the same old same private servers.
[/quote]yeah cause being different is bad

in the current rsps scene, being different and unique would be the best way to attract players.

with this type of economy, prices could change statically depending on the global amount of the object.[/quote]

Never said different is bad I just said I don’t know how it would react to the rsps ‘scene’. Anyways I do agree being unique is a good way to go and i’m thinking I will give some of your ideas ago.

Clawz fury:

which client are you using?

Galkons client.

Read full topic

item.title: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

Thank you for the ideas Vain will take them into consideration, but as Nick said it would be a drastic change for people who are use to the same old same private servers.

Wow… Looks horible in my opinion, because of The FEATURES has not been displayed

So you will judge a project by the lack of a list of features? There is not much to say about the features quite yet because there isn’t much. Client features: 459 look a like game-frame, cache packed interfaces and loading 474 data. Server features: entity based combat (thanks nick), nio networking, basic skill outline done and basic features like food and potions.

Anyways ontopic: Updated the thread a little bit with credits and so forth. I will begin developing skills when I get back from work/the gym as I have my new computer all set up and i’m not going to the beach again today lol.

Edit: Starting to gather information on how to clip projectiles.

Read full topic
item.source: Vulcan - Powered by Hyperion - Coming to a place near you!
